column1: '''''linnon''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word appearing in "The [[Lay of Leithian]] Recommenced" (ca. [[1950]]).<ref name=LB>{{LB|4}}
[[Didier Willis]] has suggested that ''linnon'' is the 1st pres. form ("I sing") of an unattested verb ''linna-'' ("to sing").<ref>[[Didier Willis]]
column2: [http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] at [http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com] (accessed 19 July 2011)</ref>
